item.title: Configuration
item.description: Kafka uses key-value pairs in the property file format for configuration. These values can be supplied either from a file or programmatically. Broker Configs The essential configurations are the following: broker.id log.dirs zookeeper.connect Topic-level configurations and defaults are discussed in more detail below. Property Default Description broker.id Each broker is uniquely identified by a non-negative integer id. This id serves as the broker’s “name” and allows the broker to be moved to a different host/port without confusing consumers.
